alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 10:02PM CDT until March 26 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LOWNDES COUNTY... At 1001 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ten Cedar Estates to Snowdoun, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Deposit, Calhoun and Letohatchee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
